item.title: With their nation under siege, Ukrainian athletes shine at Paris Olympics
item.description: As the war drags on with Russia, Ukrainians are desperate for symbols of hope and normalcy. At the Paris Olympics, Ukrainian athletes are doing their part: winning gold to help buoy the country.
